storyInfo: Upon being berated for not taking care of herself while chasing core data, a major piece of news makes its way to Mint via a letter from her professor.

attributes.text: Dear Eleanor,
I was so glad to receive your letter. I hope all is well for you.

You raised an assortment of questions in your last letter. It goes to show your learning is still ploughing forth, and it makes me truly happy that even with your illness, you've neither abandoned schoolwork nor forgotten your inquisitive heart. Yet at the same time, it worries me a little too.
If you should run into any troubles, feel free to write, be it to me or someone else. We'll be all too happy to lend you our help.
I hope the accident doesn't weigh too much on your mind. Especially concerning Miranda. It wasn't your fault in any way.
Dear Eleanor, have you found respite in life aboard Rhodes Island?

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: (Miranda...)
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: (Everyone, including my professor—they've all written to me, and so much too.)
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: (One, two, three...)
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: (There're still so many pages to read. Er—someone's sent their own love diary to me too! Oh, wow...)
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: What are you dawdling for? We're heading out!
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Ah, I'll be right there!
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: (Fine, then, I'll give a proper read later.)
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: (Everyone's worried about me, but I can't go back to see them just yet.)
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: (I... need to work harder first!)
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: Good afternoon, Mint.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Skyfire! And Mulberry, good afternoon!
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: Slowcoach! What took you so long?!
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: But, it's not departure time yet... Is there a reason you're impatient?
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: It's probably because I was grilling her with questions about Victorian universities.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Eh? Are you interested in university, Mulberry?
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: Y—Yes, I heard Victoria's universities are incredible, and Provence referred me to Skyfire...
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Hmph! Provence is nothing if not talented at getting on my nerves.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: But that aside...
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: It just so happens—and don't let her dopey face fool you—that she is the teacher's pet of a well-renowned professor. Ask her anything you want.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Ah, uwh, Zkyfaih, thtop pinthing my theeks—
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: Oww... no more violence! Violence strictly forbidden!
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: Haha, you two get along so well.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: The term is not violence, it's guidance.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Enough, no more racket. Our task this time is to survey this mountain's strata. According to information gathered from nearby settlements, earthquakes have been common in this area as of recent. Danger levels are high.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Protective equipment all ready? If we're in shape, we'll continue further in.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Y—Yes! I'm all ready!
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: I'm good too!
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: I hope we collect some good sample data...!
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: ...I'm warning you, this is not an easygoing mission. If you run off again, I am NOT looking for you!
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: I won't, I won't! I never would!
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: Er, I mostly wouldn't... probably?
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: Hmph! You'd best hope not!
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Ah! Wait for me!
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: This is the region.
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: If we enter via this cave, we should be able to reach our target survey site. Mm-hm, it all lines up with our previous calculations!
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: Wow, did you work all this out? Professionals really are amazing...
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Eheheh, it's nothing, really! Have you met Eyjafjalla before? She's the real professional! And Earthspirit too...
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: Ah, and Skyfire, of course! She's more famous for Originium Arts now, but back at university, she was a genius who skipped a whole year and got all these degrees!
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: Th—That's amazing!
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Enough of the teatime talk. Do you have all your samples for this area? If so, we're moving to the next spot.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: About that... I just ran a quick instrument analysis on the samples we got too. Skyfire, look at this.
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: It's just a rudimentary analysis, but you can see how fiercely reactive the Originium activity is in the deeper layers!
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: Active Originium reactions in deep layers... Based on my experience, there'd be disasters of all shapes and sizes in a region like this.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Such as... earthquakes. And moreover, the strata here seem very loose. It's a lot like before...
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Um? Um, no—nothing!
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: It's all just conjecture right now. For a concrete analysis, I'd still need more data.
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: Listen, now... you do remember why we came here in the first place, right?
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: O—Of course I do! We're collecting data to finish our survey mission!
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: It's okay, no worry!
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: ...I'll trust you this once. Now let's go further in.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Skyfire, the readings here are far above ordinary figures!
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: Mm, as expected...
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: The structure here's very solid. We can use it as a shelter if we need to!
attributes.name: Mulberry
Skyfire
attributes.content: Lighting and air have deviated...

attributes.name: Skyfire
attributes.content: Careful! Infected creatures ahead!
Hmph. That's all it takes, though.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Skyfire! Please don't use Arts in a place like this without warning again! It's very dangerous!
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Ahahah, she's direct like that...
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: Wow! Look, over there! Isn't that the ore the Doctor mentioned before?
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: No running off!
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: I think that was...
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: It's beginning to destabilize here. Action stations, fast!
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: These figures were read in during that tremor just now...
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: Mint...?
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Hm? Ah, I'm alright...
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: The footing's tricky through here... take care, both of you!
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: ...Hold on a moment.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Skyfire?
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Mint—where is she?
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Eh?
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: I'm sure of it, this reading! It's just—it's just the same as when the accident...!
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: If I can just get the core data—
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: ...Skyfire? Mulberry?
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: I got split up...
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: Yagh!
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: (Uwh... was that debris from above?)
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: (Don't panic, don't panic. It's just a little sting. I've still got protective gear on!)
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: (Compared to...)
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: It's rare we get to conduct an on-site deep survey! We'll get some fantastic data out this time!
attributes.name: Miranda

attributes.content: Take caution. This site is exceptionally dangerous.
attributes.name: Prudent Researcher

attributes.content: Oh, come on, we have protective gear on, don't we?
attributes.name: Miranda

attributes.content: Not to mention, if we were scared of danger, we wouldn't have joined the Professor's lab, would we?
attributes.name: Miranda

attributes.content: 'In seeking the truth, I willingly brave all hazard.' ...That's our motto, you know.
attributes.name: Miranda

attributes.content: Honestly... there's no reaching you.
attributes.name: Prudent Researcher

attributes.content: Still, be careful at least. If anything should happen, in the worst case...
attributes.name: Prudent Researcher

attributes.content: The Feline girl seals her lips, shuts her eyes, and places a hand on her arm wrapped in clothing.
Her wound, which once bled incessantly, is now only a shallow scar and minute crystals.
That was the price she paid for pursuing her own goal, and the symbol of her becoming an Infected.
(Compared to Oripathy, this little scratch is barely anything!)
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: (I made a promise...)
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: (And if I let this slip, who knows when I'll be able to get data like this again!)
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: (Even if it's just for Miranda, I have to...)
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: (Right, first I need to send a message to Skyfire and Mulberry.)
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: '...Please both evacuate to safe area, I'll come once finished gathering data...'
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: ...Okay, that'll do fine.
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: (I should be at a fairly deep level by now. Hm... a little further forward.)
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: (Urgh! The tremors are getting stronger, I have to be quick...!)
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: (Just a little closer!)
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: (Oh no, it's trapped the protective gear...)
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: (...I can't afford to mind it!)
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: (I'm so, so close!)
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: (Found it! The strongest region of activity... is right here!)
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: (This is brilliant, I just need some samples from here, and to get some figures, and I can start an in-depth analysis...)
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: Wah! It's starting to collapse here too!
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: No! I can't get...
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: Idiot! Duck!
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Entrance has collapsed! Over this way!
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Ow! That hurts...
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: I can't believe you can still tell pain—you're a living headache.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: S—Skyfire... and Mulberry!
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: Exit over here!
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Let me say this in advance! Mint, I'm very, very angry with you right now!
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Save your breath, safe location first!
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Wait, my samples—
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: There's no waiting! Move!
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Okay, we should be fine here.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: *pant*... *pant*...
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: I'm a little... *gasp*, *gasp*... out of breath!
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: Serves you right. Hmph. I'll have my turn with you in due time... but right now, I'm not the one who should be berating you.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Take it away, Mulberry.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: M—Mulberry...?
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: ...Separating from your team and acting alone, under hazardous circumstances...
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Is just asking for everything to go wrong! And far too irresponsible!
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: What if something did happen to you?! Aren't you meant to be the clearest on how dangerous it is here? You can't have not considered it once!
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Uwh, I'm—I'm sorry! You're right...
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: But, I needed to collect core data...
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: I don't care about the data! In my eyes, nothing is more important than your own safety, Mint!!
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Uwwhh!
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: No whining! No sympathy!
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Sorry, let me interrupt.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Mint... you didn't SERIOUSLY believe you could've made it back?
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: You still think once you finish this research up, you can apply to resume studies? You think that way, everything will go back to how it was?
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: If that's your opinion, then give up as soon as you can. Your professor and university friends might not bear to tell you the truth, but I will.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: You can't go back.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Victoria is nowhere near as guileless as Rhodes Island. Even if you'd gotten some breakthrough result, you'd still—
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: I know!
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: Stop, Skyfire. I do, I do. I know.
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: But... I...
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: ...Well?! What did the doctor say?
attributes.name: Anxious Researcher

attributes.content: Is it—Is it really Oripathy...?
attributes.name: Anxious Researcher

attributes.content: Mm...
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: What for?! What are we meant to do now?!
attributes.name: Anxious Researcher

attributes.content: Forget me for now! More importantly, how's Miranda? And our data from before—
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: About that. Miranda hasn't woken up yet.
attributes.name: Anxious Researcher

attributes.content: And the data... isn't with us.
attributes.name: Anxious Researcher

attributes.content: Eh?
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: Once you had the accident, the Professor and us abandoned the investigation and made an emergency evacuation.
attributes.name: Anxious Researcher

attributes.content: We couldn't have just ignored you under those circumstances!
attributes.name: Anxious Researcher

attributes.content: But... but I'm sure Miranda gave me the samples! I already had them on me!
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: You were so injured! We were stuck outside and couldn't help you, and when we got you out, you were clutching your fists hard...
attributes.name: Anxious Researcher

attributes.content: But there was... nothing in your hands at all...
attributes.name: Anxious Researcher

attributes.content: I lost hold of everything then...
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: I don't actually care whether or not I can go back to university!
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: But I can't let this slip away from me, Skyfire...! If—If I can't get this most core data, then I...
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: Then what have I persevered in surveying for, even caught Oripathy for—and Miranda—what have we done everything for...
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: That's why I have to go! I...
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: That's not true!
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Eh?
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: I don't know exactly what happened to you before, Mint, but I do know that right now, we're a team! And you're representing more than yourself!
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: No matter how important your research is... Cherish yourself more, Mint, please!
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: I don't know much about research... but Skyfire has the knowledge there. She can help you.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: And I do know full well how to respond to the dangers following an earthquake, how I can keep the two of you as safe as possible!
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: If that's still not enough, Rhodes Island has even more dependable veterans still... Why do you even have to bear all this by yourself?!
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: It's—This is what I'm meant to do!
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: No matter where I am, no matter the danger, I'll continue this research!
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: 'In seeking the truth, I willingly brave all hazard'... I swore it, when I joined the Professor's research lab! So I have to...
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: No! That's not right!
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: I can understand you're pursuing the truth as a researcher, but it's in no way—no way at all, a duty you have to assume!
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: In this respect, Mulberry is right.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Mint, your professor and your fellows have all written you letters, haven't they?
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: The Professor's... letter...
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: Yes, the letter. You brought it with you today, didn't you?
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Have none of those letters mentioned it, really? They even got in touch with me, for how uneasy they were.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.text: Dear Eleanor, have you found respite in life aboard Rhodes Island?
I have some good news, and wanted to tell you first thing:
Miranda's regained consciousness lately. She's slowly on the mend, and there have been no life-threatening residual effects.
I always curse myself; I should never have let my students bear such a heavy burden. I've been able to tell that you've taken on some kind of heavy weight upon yourself, ever since the accident.
It was nothing more than an accident; it was nobody's fault. Of course, that includes you.
Just as I've mentioned previously:
Everyone, seeing you blame yourself and force yourself because of it, has been duly worried.
Eleanor, it's my hope you don't stretch yourself too thin.

I want you to remember, our pursuit of the truth originates from our purest curiosity and thirst, and it's not for some outside force to impose on us. Miranda's never blamed you. Just as you made your choices, she did nothing more than make hers too.

Miranda is undergoing further therapy right now at hospital, and she's in quite hale condition, far be it from you to worry. She misses you very much, and she's written to you too. If you get the chance, do pay her a visit.
And don't forget. We chase the same unknown answer. It's not a duty forced on us by anyone. On this journey, you are not alone.
I look forward to your reply, Eleanor. Everyone is eager to know how you've been doing lately.

attributes.content: Miranda... Miranda woke up...?
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: There is one! There's a letter from Miranda!
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: Er, ah...
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: Uwh... th—thank goodness...
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: What are you crying here for, of all the places? You're hopeless...
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Well? Are you still going to insist on throwing yourself into the fire, even now?
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: I... I've always felt, *gulp*... it was—it was my fault, I lost the samples Miranda staked her life on getting...
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: So I had to... I had to...
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: It sounds like this was a very complicated accident...
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: No matter what, though, Mint, don't do this again! No more going around without caring about your safety!
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: And no more making so much trouble! If you need it, we'll... all of Rhodes Island will help you out! We'll find a way!
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: *sniffle*... Wuhhh...!
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: I'm so sorry! I'm so sorry! I'm sorry you all had to worry over me again!
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: Ca... Can I still do in-depth geological data collection next time, then?
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: A—As long as you take appropriate measures, and don't act arbitrarily...
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Hey. Don't let her fool you. She doesn't look like she's learned a damn lesson to me.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.text: To my beloved Professor,
I think it should be fairly chilly in Victoria by the time my letter makes it to you? I hope you and everyone else are doing fine.
First, I'd like to thank you for your previous reply. You've helped answer a lot of my doubts for me.

You encouraged me not to give up on my studies, even during my treatment here at Rhodes Island. Even though being away from Victoria has made a lot of things inconvenient, there's still a replete library here, as well as seniors and veterans to depend on. My days here have been more fascinating and wonderful than I expected, and I've gained a lot for it.
'In seeking the truth, I willingly brave all hazard.'
I still know this maxim by heart. No matter how challenging, Professor, I'll never give up.
But I want everyone to be reassured. I'll pay mind to my own health, and I won't force myself to take on further risks.
I hope Miranda's recovery goes as speedily as possible. If I get the chance, I'll be sure to return and visit her!
Please say hello to her for me!

attributes.content: 'Thank you for always looking out for me. I'll look out for myself at Rhodes Island, and continue my research...'
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: Hm... alright, I think that'll do it!
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: Here you are! I've been looking for you all day.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Skyfire!
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: What do you need me for? Is something the matter?
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: Didn't you tell me you wanted some reference literature? I've found you a few papers along the lines of your abstract. Also, some that might be unrelated in terms of content, but I feel the research methods are worth consulting.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Yes, all here. Take your pick.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Skyfire... are you saying—this is all for me...?!
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: Hold it! I just had the chance to look while I was checking over documents, don't you get... wraagh!
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Skyfire! Listen to me... I've run my in-depth geological stratification analysis! Ohhh! Eyjafjalla commended me, too!
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: Really? Let me see!
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Well, isn't this a job well done...
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: I'm assuming you didn't go adventuring again for this data? Hm?
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Not at all! I applied for a mission, and worked alongside the other operators, all properly!
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: I have it figured out now! No matter what, I'll continue doing the research I want to do!
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: I still have so many things I'm curious about, so many phenomena I want to figure out... I won't leave anything unfinished no matter the results!
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: But I don't want to worry everyone either! I won't get carried away like that again!
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: Not to mention I'm going to pay a friend a visit sometime soon, too...
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: If I'm overly exhausted or hurt by then, it'll be awfully embarrassing for me to meet her!
attributes.name: Mint
